person.persName: Ira Hart Stout (St. Louis, Missouri, resident and soldier.)

body.p: St. Louis, Missouri, resident and soldier. Missouri native. Son of Ira Stout and Catherine Stout. Married to Sarah Woolfolk Stout. Father of P. Willis Stout, David Stout, and Wilbur Stout. Served as third major in the 12th Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A.) from November 17, 1862, to January 7, 1863.
